articles.title: 'Reputations at stake as cricket awaits judgement'
articles.description: One of the most divisive and damaging episodes English cricket has seen approaches a conclusion, but judgement will not bring closure, says Dan Roan.
articles.content:
Azeem Rafiq arrives at the hearing on Tuesday

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: New women's cricket league in India heralded as 'game-changer' | CBC News
articles.description: India has a brand-new professional women's cricket league, and it's generating a lot of excitement in the country and among analysts, with many calling it a game-changer for women's sports.
articles.content:
The bat cracked sharply for the first hit of India's inaugural women's cricket league, and the crowd gathered at Mumbai's DY Patil stadium let out a string of whoops and cheers.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
